languages.text: {n}Спустя три часа сервочереп ставит точку в эпическом произведении, которое описывает всю вашу непростую и полную испытаний жизнь. Магнум опус завершен, и пускай прямо сейчас он выглядит как многометровая гирлянда из исписанной пергаментной ленты — на самом деле вы держите в своих руках мемуары величайш{mf|его|ей} из Вольных Торговцев, тщательно зафиксированные пером сервочерепа!{/n}

{n}Three watch hours later, the servo-skull ends the epic work of chronicling the many hardships and adversities of your life. Your magnum opus is complete, and although it may look like metres and metres of jumbled parchment now, you know it for what it truly is: the memoirs of the greatest Rogue Trader to have ever lived, carefully recorded by a servo-skull's quill!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Спустя три часа сервочереп ставит точку в эпическом произведении, которое описывает всю вашу непростую и полную испытаний жизнь. Магнум опус завершен, и пускай прямо сейчас он выглядит как многометровая гирлянда из исписанной пергаментной ленты — на самом деле вы держите в своих руках мемуары величайш{mf|его|ей} из Вольных Торговцев, тщательно зафиксированные пером сервочерепа!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Three watch hours later, the servo-skull ends the epic work chronicling the hardships and adversities of your entire life. Your magnum opus is complete, and although it may look like metres and metres of jumbled parchment now, you know it for what it truly is — the memoirs of the greatest Rogue Trader who has ever lived, carefully recorded by a servo-skull's quill!{/n}

{n}Three watch hours later, the servo-skull ends the epic work chronicling the hardships and adversities of your entire life. Your magnum opus is complete, and although it may look like metres and metres of jumbled parchment now, you know it for what it truly is — the memoirs of the greatest Rogue Trader who has ever lived, carefully recorded by a servo-skull's quill!{/n}

Your magnum opus is complete, and although it may look like metres and metres of jumbled parchment now, you know it for what it truly is: the memoirs of the greatest Rogue Trader to have ever lived, carefully recorded by a servo-skull's quill!{/n}

Your magnum opus is complete, and although it may look like metres and metres of jumbled parchment now, you know it for what it truly is: the memoirs of the greatest Rogue Trader to have ever lived, carefully recorded by a servo-skull's quill!{/n}

{n}Three watch hours later, the servo-skull ends the epic work of chronicling the many hardships and adversities of your life. Your magnum opus is complete, and although it may look like metres and metres of jumbled parchment now, you know it for what it truly is: the memoirs of the greatest Rogue Trader to have ever lived, carefully recorded by a servo-skull's quill!{/n}

languages.text: {n}見張りが3回交代する頃、サーヴォスカルはあなたの人生の多くの困難や逆境を記録する壮大な作業を終えた。あなたの大作が完成した。今は無造作に積み重なった羊皮紙の束に見えるかもしれないが、それが何であるか、あなたはよく知っている。それは、最も偉大なローグトレーダーがこれまで生きてきた回想録で、サーヴォスカルの羽ペンによって慎重に記録されたものだった！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Three watch hours later, the servo-skull ends the epic work of chronicling the many hardships and adversities of your life. Your magnum opus is complete, and although it may look like metres and metres of jumbled parchment now, you know it for what it truly is: the memoirs of the greatest Rogue Trader to have ever lived, carefully recorded by a servo-skull's quill!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}見張りが3回交代する頃、サーヴォスカルはあなたの人生の多くの困難や逆境を記録する壮大な作業を終えた。あなたの大作が完成した。今は無造作に積み重なった羊皮紙の束に見えるかもしれないが、それが何であるか、あなたはよく知っている。それは、最も偉大なローグトレーダーがこれまで生きてきた回想録で、サーヴォスカルの羽ペンによって慎重に記録されたものだった！{/n}

languages.text: {n}Drei Stunden Wache später beendet der Servoschädel die epische Aufgabe, die zahlreichen Entbehrungen und Widrigkeiten deines Lebens aufzuzeichnen. Dein Opus magnum ist fertig, und obwohl es derzeit aussieht wie Meter über Meter zerknülltes Pergament, erkennst du es als das, was es in Wahrheit ist: die Memoiren {mf|des größten Freihändlers, der|der größten Freihändlerin, die} jemals gelebt hat, sorgsam festgehalten von der Schreibfeder eines Servoschädels!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Three watch hours later, the servo-skull ends the epic work of chronicling the many hardships and adversities of your life. Your magnum opus is complete, and although it may look like metres and metres of jumbled parchment now, you know it for what it truly is: the memoirs of the greatest Rogue Trader to have ever lived, carefully recorded by a servo-skull's quill!{/n}

traits.locale_text: Drei Stunden Wache später beendet der Servoschädel die epische Aufgabe, die zahlreichen Entbehrungen und Widrigkeiten deines Lebens aufzuzeichnen. Dein Opus magnum ist fertig, und obwohl es derzeit aussieht wie Meter über Meter zerknülltes Pergament, erkennst du es als das, was es in Wahrheit ist: die Memoiren {mf|des größten Freihändlers, der|der größten Freihändlerin, die} jemals gelebt hat, sorgsam festgehalten von der Schreibfeder eines Servoschädels!{/n}

languages.text: {n}Trois heures plus tard, le servocrâne achève de consigner le récit de votre vie épique et de votre lutte constante contre l'adversité. Même s'il est encore sous la forme d'un long serpentin de parchemin enchevêtré, vous le savez : vous tenez là votre chef-d'œuvre, les mémoires {mf|du plus grand libre-marchand|de la plus grande libre-marchande} que l'univers ait connu, rédigé de la plume d'un servocrâne !{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Three watch hours later, the servo-skull ends the epic work of chronicling the many hardships and adversities of your life. Your magnum opus is complete, and although it may look like metres and metres of jumbled parchment now, you know it for what it truly is: the memoirs of the greatest Rogue Trader to have ever lived, carefully recorded by a servo-skull's quill!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Trois heures plus tard, le servocrâne achève de consigner le récit de votre vie épique et de votre lutte constante contre l'adversité. Même s'il est encore sous la forme d'un long serpentin de parchemin enchevêtré, vous le savez : vous tenez là votre chef-d'œuvre, les mémoires {mf|du plus grand libre-marchand|de la plus grande libre-marchande} que l'univers ait connu, rédigé de la plume d'un servocrâne !{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tres horas de guardia después, el servocráneo concluye la titánica tarea de documentar las numerosas penurias y adversidades de tu vida. Tu obra magna está completa, y aunque en estos momentos parezca poco más que unas decenas de metros de papel vitela enmarañado, tú sabes reconocerla como lo que es: ¡las memorias {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente más sensacional que jamás ha existido, redactadas con esmero por la pluma de un servocráneo!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Three watch hours later, the servo-skull ends the epic work of chronicling the many hardships and adversities of your life. Your magnum opus is complete, and although it may look like metres and metres of jumbled parchment now, you know it for what it truly is: the memoirs of the greatest Rogue Trader to have ever lived, carefully recorded by a servo-skull's quill!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tres horas de guardia después, el servocráneo concluye la titánica tarea de documentar las numerosas penurias y adversidades de tu vida. Tu obra magna está completa, y aunque en estos momentos parezca poco más que unas decenas de metros de papel vitela enmarañado, tú sabes reconocerla como lo que es: ¡las memorias {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente más sensacional que jamás ha existido, redactadas con esmero por la pluma de un servocráneo!{/n}

languages.text: {n}三个小时过去了，这颗伺服头骨完成了这部史诗，忠实记录了你人生中的无数逆境与艰辛。此时此刻，你的巨著已经正式完成。尽管它看起来不过是一大卷杂乱无章的羊皮纸，但只有你才了解它真正的价值——这是有史以来最伟大的行商浪人的口述回忆录，由伺服头骨的羽毛笔一字一句记录而成！{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Three watch hours later, the servo-skull ends the epic work of chronicling the many hardships and adversities of your life. Your magnum opus is complete, and although it may look like metres and metres of jumbled parchment now, you know it for what it truly is: the memoirs of the greatest Rogue Trader to have ever lived, carefully recorded by a servo-skull's quill!{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}三个小时过去了，这颗伺服头骨完成了这部史诗，忠实记录了你人生中的无数逆境与艰辛。此时此刻，你的巨著已经正式完成。尽管它看起来不过是一大卷杂乱无章的羊皮纸，但只有你才了解它真正的价值——这是有史以来最伟大的行商浪人的口述回忆录，由伺服头骨的羽毛笔一字一句记录而成！{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hizmeletler, üç saatin ardından hayatındaki tüm zorlukları ve maceraları yazmayı bitiriyor. Şaheserin hazır. Şimdilik yalnızca metrelerce uzanan bir parşömenden ibaret olsa da onun ne olduğunun gayet farkındasın: Gelmiş geçmiş en iyi Hür Tacir'in, bir hizmeletin kaleminden itinayla dökülen anıları!{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Three watch hours later, the servo-skull ends the epic work of chronicling the many hardships and adversities of your life. Your magnum opus is complete, and although it may look like metres and metres of jumbled parchment now, you know it for what it truly is: the memoirs of the greatest Rogue Trader to have ever lived, carefully recorded by a servo-skull's quill!{/n}
